text: Velapur is a village in Kopargaon taluka (tahsil), Ahmednagar district, Maharashtra, India. Its Pincode is 423602. Its STD code is 02423.Velapur pin code details in AhmednagarVelapur in Ahmednagarravel Time From Velapur Velapur ==Agriculture== Most people of Velapur are farmers. Popular crops are sugarcane, wheat, and onions. == References == Category:Villages in Ahmednagar district
